description:
Designed for both mountain and touring bikes, the extra long brake arms can easily clear mudguards and extra wide tires.

  • Made of aluminum
  • Comes with S65T brake pads
  • 107mm long brake arms
  • 16mm mounting bolts
  • Front and rear brakes sold separately
  • Brake levers and cables not included
name: Shimano Alivio BR-T4000 X Type V-Brakes
